nodes.text: Star News was a regular feature in Star Wars Insider and focused on various news and announcements within the world of Lucasfilm Ltd. It also had a number of subsections, such as "Star Sightings," which would focus on more specialized areas — "Star Sightings," for example, would focus on people associated with Star Wars and any news pertaining to them, either Star Wars-related or not. One example was in Star Wars Insider 45 where Star News mentioned NASCAR and Pepsi commercials for Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace featuring "Marfalump".
